content: I am not sure where the comprehensive model comes to life here? For me, this is mostly a summary of the work of Lisa Carlgren and her co-authors, enriched by the philosophy of the HPI School of Design Thinking. For a comprehensive model (although you cite Carlgren et al. yourself that we should rather not think normative in this respect) I would expect some more thoughts and especially own ideas. And why do we need a comprehensive model anyway?
